Class GTSurfaceTensionODE

java.lang.Object
neqsim.physicalproperties.interfaceproperties.surfacetension.GTSurfaceTensionODE
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.math3.ode.FirstOrderDifferentialEquations
public class GTSurfaceTensionODE extends Object implements org.apache.commons.math3.ode.FirstOrderDifferentialEquations

GTSurfaceTensionODE class. ODE-system for integrating the surface tension in cases where the a reference component number mole density can be used as integration variable. This method can only be used when the reference component density varies monotonically over the interface, and where there are no binary interaction parameters for the attractive parameter in the EOS.

Version:
$Id: $Id
Author:
Olaf Trygve Berglihn olaf.trygve.berglihn@sintef.no

    • solveRho

      private void solveRho(double[] rho, double[] mu, double[][] dmu_drho, double[] p, double[] f, double[][] jac)
      SolveRho. Solve for the equilibrium density in the interface. Solves the equilibrium relations with the Newton-Raphson method.
      Parameters:
      rho - Number density [mol/m3]
      mu - Chemical potential [J/mol]
      dmu_drho - Chemical potential derivative with respect to mole numbers [J/mol^2]
      p - Pressure [Pa]
      f - Residual of equilibrium relations.
      jac - Jacobian of the equilibrium relations.
